judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Appeal hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice Pomeroy dissents.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Stewart B. Barmen, with him Raphael, Sheinberg & BaA'-men, P. A., for appellant.
No oral argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Klein, Appellant, v. Ginter.
Argued October 10,1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Stewart B. Barmen, with him Raphael, Sheinberg & BaA'-men, P. A., for appellant.
No oral argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
December 5, 1974:
